text: Ezɨ me amizir arazir kurabar, gumazamiziba men arazir kaba bagh ua arazir kurabar me ikarvagham. Me ghaze, aruebar dagher ekiaba apir arazim ko dɨpar onganiba apir arazim, kar arazir bar aghuim. Egha me ia koma apava, egha ia gamima ia bar mɨze, egha ian ziabagh asɨghasɨsi. Egha me uan ifavarir arazir me amiba bagha bar akonge.
